casebody.data:
No. 09-723. Aurelius Capital Partners, LP, et al., Petitioners v. The Republic of Argentina, et al. 559 U.S. 988, 130 S. Ct. 1691,

176 L. Ed. 2d 207,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 1910. March 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Justice Sotomayor took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 584 F.3d 120.
